repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:wheezy

# add our user and group first to make sure their IDs get assigned consistently, regardless of whatever dependencies get added
RUN groupadd -r mongodb && useradd -r -g mongodb mongodb

RUN apt-get update \
  && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y curl \
  && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

RUN curl -f -o /usr/local/bin/gosu -SL 'https://github.com/tianon/gosu/releases/download/1.1/gosu' \
  && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/gosu

RUN gpg --batch --keyserver pgp.mit.edu --recv-keys BDC0DB28022D7DEA1490DC3E7085801C857FD301

ENV MONGO_VERSION 2.7.7

RUN curl -f -SL "https://fastdl.mongodb.org/linux/mongodb-linux-x86_64-$MONGO_VERSION.tgz" -o mongo.tgz \
  && curl -f -SL "https://fastdl.mongodb.org/linux/mongodb-linux-x86_64-$MONGO_VERSION.tgz.sig" -o mongo.tgz.sig \
  && gpg --batch --verify mongo.tgz.sig \
  && tar -xvf mongo.tgz -C /usr/local --strip-components=1 \
  && rm mongo.tgz*

VOLUME /data/db

COPY docker-entrypoint.sh /entrypoint.sh
ENTRYPOINT ["/entrypoint.sh"]

EXPOSE 27017
CMD ["mongod"]
